resources.string: Cedric enters with an aura of wilderness, a quiver on his back and a bow in hand, his eyes sharp and observant, taking in the tavern with the instinct of a hunter. \n\n"I\'ll take a drink that reflects the untamed wilderness, perhaps something as refreshing and wild as a forest stream."

string-array.name: player_cedric
string-array.item: A drink that echoes the wilderness after a day attuned to nature\'s rhythm. May it offer a moment of connection.
Be careful, that drink might just have its own wild spirit and wander off before you take a sip.
A ranger seeking a drink that mirrors the untamed. Perhaps my company could add a touch of wilderness to your evening?
